channel.title: Cheat client help. :/
channel.description:
Theres this fag who keeps logging into my server, and moving my NPC's you can trade and it's pissing me off. I don't want to have to watch my server for hackers who are attacking my NPC's on a cheat client. So if there is anyway you can think of, that willl help me make it so Cheat client's such as. Bombs Cheat Client. Please. IM me or PM me. :)
I don't want to have to baby my server 24/7....
So yeah. If any of you could help it would be appreciated greatly.
It's a 377 base. :3

item.title: Cheat client help. :/
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

Isn’t there many tutorials for this online? or Have you just not tried looking it up? I’m sure you have though if you were in the right mind.

Read full topic
